Create bar graphs summarizing cell counts for clusters

Source: R/plots.R
plot_cell_count.Rd

Create bar graphs summarizing cell counts for clusters

plot_cell_count(
  sobj_in,
  x,
  fill_col = NULL,
  facet_col = NULL,
  yaxis = "fraction",
  plot_colors = NULL,
  plot_lvls = NULL,
  na_color = "grey90",
  n_label = TRUE,
  label_aes = list(),
  facet_rows = 1,
  facet_scales = "free_x",
  ...
)

Arguments

sobj_in

Seurat object or data.frame containing data
x

meta.data column containing clusters to use for creating bars
fill_col

meta.data column to use for coloring bars
facet_col

meta.data column containing groups to use for spliting plot into facets
yaxis

Units to plot on the y-axis, either "fraction" or "counts"
plot_colors

Character vector containing colors for plotting
plot_lvls

Character vector containing levels for ordering
na_color

Color to use for missing values
n_label

Include label showing the number of cells represented by each bar
label_aes

Named list providing additional label aesthetics (color, size, etc.)
facet_rows

The number of facet rows. Use this argument if facet_col is specified
facet_scales

If facet_col is used, this argument passes a scales specification to facet_wrap. Can be "fixed", "free", "free_x", or "free_y"
...

Additional arguments to pass to ggplot

Value

ggplot object
